svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Health insurance coverage vs GDP per capita, 2011
The vertical axis shows the percentage of population covered by health insurance (including population having free
access to healthcare services provided by the State). The horizontal axis shows GDP per capita (adjusting for
Share of population covered by health insurance (ILO (2014))
Source: World Bank, OWID based on ILO (2014) and OECD (2017)
